props.heading: Exploring the reengineering of immune cells
props.body: The Sarafan ChEM-H Institute scholar is building a multidisciplinary lab to explore the reengineering of immune cells. Before coming to Stanford, she says, â€œI was thinking in terms of understanding. Now I feel that I can start thinking in terms of creating.
